code: import axios from'axios';import'dotenv/config';export var login=function login(data){return{type:'LOGIN_USER',payload:axios({method:'POST',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+'/user/login',data:data})};};export var logout=function logout(){return{type:'LOGOUT_USER'};};export var getUser=function getUser(authorization,userId){return{type:'GET_USER',payload:axios({method:'GET',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+'/user',headers:{authorization:authorization,user_id:userId}})};};export var postUser=function postUser(data){return{type:'POST_USER',payload:axios({method:'POST',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+'/user/register',data:data})};};export var updateUser=function updateUser(userId,data){return{type:'UPDATE_USER',payload:axios({method:'PATCH',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user/".concat(userId),data:data})};};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(UserId){return{type:'DELETE_USER',payload:axios({method:'DELETE',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user/".concat(UserId)})};};export var editMenu=function editMenu(data,otoritas_id){return{type:'UPDATE_MENU',payload:axios({method:'PATCH',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+"/user/menu/".concat(otoritas_id),data:data})};};export var getMenu=function getMenu(){return{type:'GET_MENU',payload:axios({method:'GET',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+'/user/menu'})};};
